19182247651731523235.Text: Korst Wind-Eye has told me more about the Bloodmoon Prophecy, and the signs that are foretold within. The fire from the lake of ice, the tide of dead horkers. Now the moon itself has turned blood red. He tells me that all that remains is the Hunter's Game.

16426171121206411721.Text: According to legend, the Hunter chooses his Prey from the ranks of Man. Who and how many he chooses varies by the era. Wind-Eye does not know what will happen in the coming days, but he fears the worst.

294398767673810851.Text: I awoke from my sleep to see werewolves surrounding me, and then blacked out. When I came to my senses, I found myself in a chamber deep in the heart of the Mortrag Glacier, the Daedra Lord Hircine before me.

216491482381503461.Text: I received a dream from Hircine calling me to join him for his Hunt. When I awoke, I was in the Mortrag Glacier.

1295913728126523287.Text: Hircine spoke to me, telling me that I was to be a part of his hunt. He has gathered the champions of Solstheim--Falx Carius from Fort Frostmoth, Tharsten Heart-Fang from the Skaal, and the frost giant Karstaag--to participate. All of us are to find our way through this glacier, though the others have gone ahead already. Only one of us will survive to face the Hunter in battle. I should continue ahead and see what awaits me.

1675676051538012168.Text: I've encountered Captain Falx Carius, who was brought here after the attack on Fort Frostmoth. He suggests we work together to escape Hircine's prison.

3142728887296638452.Text: I have chosen to work with Carius to escape this place.

1044011680951130263.Text: I have told Carius that only one of us can survive this test, and it must be me. I will have to fight the captain.

27328226622244623964.Text: Carius has died in the Mortrag Glacier.

280641611868778920.Text: I have found the key that will allow me to proceed through the gate in the center of this maze.

1996313375195684724.Text: As we approached the gate, Carius told me that he can go no further. If I am to finish this fight, I will have to do so alone. He warned me to beware the giant Karstaag, as well as Heart-Fang, whom he does not trust. If I succeed, perhaps Carius will be able to find a way out of this place himself.

2460514759723923702.Text: In the next ring of the glacier, I was greeted by Tharsten Heart-Fang, who has also been brought here by the Daedra Lord Hircine. He believes we should work together to fight Hircine.

261959082048230001.Text: I have chosen to work with Heart-Fang to defeat Hircine.

269069009844210981.Text: I told Heart-Fang that, as there could only be one survivor in this deadly game, I could not work with him. He responded that he alone would survive this Hunt, and that it was his birthright to do so. Apparenty, Heart-Fang has the Ring of Hircine, and has used its magic to prolong his life and rule the Skaal for generations. Now, he claims I will have to face him in his "true form."

23438103901833112896.Text: After finding the chest empty, Heart-Fang spoke to me. He told me that he has the key to continue on in the Hunt, and he will do so alone. He also claims to have the Ring of Hircine, and to have had it for many generations. Heart-Fang seems ready to kill me, and claims I must now fight him in his "true form."

28508225771506928899.Text: As I entered the next ring of the glacier, I found Tharsten Heart-Fang. He told me that he alone will continue on in the Hunt, and that this is what he was born to do. He also claims to have the Ring of Hircine, and to have had it for many generations. Heart-Fang seems ready to kill me, and claims I must now fight him in his "true form."

188302990614188995.Text: Heart-Fang is dead. As he died, the Ring of Hircine disappeared from his finger and appeared in my inventory.

2555930546159799664.Text: On the corpse of Heart-Fang, I have found the second key to allow me to proceed through this maze.

209372181252814537.Text: I have entered what appears to be the center of the Mortrag Glacier. In it is the frost giant Karstaag, the final participant in Hircine's Hunt.

306438186524022814.Text: The frost giant Karstaag is dead. I am now the only one that has made it to the final stage of Hircine's Hunt.

1265429941389310490.Text: Hircine has appeared and spoken to me. He says I have proven myself to be a worthy hunter, and that I now will receive the greatest honor he can bestow--to be his Prey. Hircine has also questioned me as to what the greatest strength of a hunter is: strength, speed, or guile. He says that I must choose one of these three.

12123267882369613406.Text: I have chosen Strength as a hunter's greatest asset.

16818241101290728556.Text: I have chosen Speed as a hunter's greatest asset.

18283141041521222250.Text: I have chosen Guile as a hunter's greatest asset.

283262631150420380.Text: Hircine has accepted my choice, and tells me that for me to face the Daedra Lord himself in battle would not be sporting. Instead, I am to face one of Hircine's Aspects.

21577283393142530296.Text: I have defeated Hircine's Aspect of Strength. I should now try to leave the glacier through the gate.

18155143631678220598.Text: I have defeated Hircine's Aspect of Speed. I should now try to leave the glacier through the gate.

125291381549234935.Text: I have defeated Hircine's Aspect of Guile. I should now try to leave the glacier through the gate.

28150253901049630120.Text: As I left the glacier, I heard a loud rumbling sound, as if the entire structure were coming down around me. I found myself outside the fallen ice mountain, with Hircine's message echoing in my thoughts. The Hunter has been defeated, but he will return one day to hunt again.
